about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Experience all the grandeur of big-time, modern American freight railroading – bustling and constant action, tough grades, powerful diesels, majestic western scenery, and extraordinary history – come together on Union Pacific’s legendary Sherman Hill for Train Sim World 3.

It’s a new dawn, it’s a new day, the Sherman Hill route now features the same volumetric skies and lighting as introduced in Train Sim World 3!

Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Super Bundle!

Sherman Hill stretches 58 miles between the classic railroad cities of Cheyenne and Laramie, Wyoming, crossing the Continental Divide at an elevation of 8,015 feet. One of the crowning achievements of America’s Transcontinental Railroad, the crossing of Sherman Hill was built in the early 1860s and ever since has been a mecca of American railroading at its best. Throughout the decades, Sherman Hill, with its tough 1.5 percent westbound grade across the Laramie Mountains, has been home to Union Pacific’s biggest and best motive power, with today’s third-generation, high-horsepower diesels hauling double stacks, autos, manifest freight, coal, and more.

Climb aboard Union Pacific’s modern and potent 4,300-horsepower Electro-Motive SD70ACe and veteran 3,000-horsepower EMD SD40-2 to forward tonnage between sprawling yards at Cheyenne and Laramie. Included with the route are 7 types of modern freight equipment.

Choose how you want to play; operate trains, complete the route tasks, or simply pick a vantage point and watch the action unfold. Create your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer and share them on Creators Club. Whatever you choose to do, there's lots to see and experience in Train Sim World 3: Sherman Hill

Key Features


  • 58-mile (93 km) route from Cheyenne to Laramie, Wyoming
  • Now upgraded with Train Sim World 3 standard volumetric skies and lighting
  • EMD SD70ACe diesel locomotive in Union Pacific livery
  • EMD SD40-2 diesel locomotive in Union Pacific livery
  • 60‘ Boxcar, Reefer Car, Autorack, 3-Bay Covered Hopper, Tank Car, Bethgon II Hopper and Gunderson Husky Stack freight cars
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • Accurate true-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Training Modules
  • Includes 6 Scenarios and an extensive 24-hour Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 5.6 GB
